==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|暗|中|模|索}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|ja|暗中|模索|tr1=anchū|tr2=mosaku|t1=in the dark|t2=groping, probing, investigation}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あんちゅうもさく}}

# [[grope|groping]] in the dark, [[investigation]]/[[struggle|struggling]]/[[probe|probing]] without any clues

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|あんちゅうもさく}}

# to [[grope]] in the dark, to [[investigate]]/[[struggle]]/[[probe]] without any [[clue]]s
